bibl.title: Continuity of Nabataean Law in the Petra Papyri: A Methodological Exercise.
bibl.note: Examine en part. P. Petra I, 1, à la lumière des P. Yadin.

bibl.title: From Hellenism to Islam. Cultural and Linguistic Change in the Roman Near East

bibl.seg: COTTON Hannah M., Continuity of Nabataean Law in the Petra Papyri: A Methodological Exercise.
Hannah M. COTTON, Robert G. HOYLAND, Jonathan J. PRICE and David J. WASSERSTEIN (Edd.), From Hellenism to Islam. Cultural and Linguistic Change in the Roman Near East (Cambridge, 2009) pp. 154-174.
Examine en part. P. Petra I, 1, à la lumière des P. Yadin.
